thread.title: AP PHOTOS: The rise and fall of Oscar Pistorius
thread.title_full: AP PHOTOS: The rise and fall of Oscar Pistorius

title: AP PHOTOS: The rise and fall of Oscar Pistorius
text: > Top News AP PHOTOS: The rise and fall of Oscar Pistorius FILE - In this Tuesday, Feb. 19, 2013 file photo pallbearers carry the coffin of Reeva Steenkamp, the late girlfriend of Oscar Pistorius, at her funeral in Port Elizabeth, South Africa. Pistoriusâ€™ release from prison to serve the remainder of a five-year manslaughter sentence under house arrest was the latest chapter in the story of a once-inspiring double-amputee runner who made history at the Olympics, and then killed his girlfriend, Steenkamp. (AP Photo/Schalk van Zuydam-file)
